## ExtensionManager.tags property

A shorthand getter for retrieving the tags from the extension manager.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly tags: ExtensionTags<NodeNames<GExtension>, MarkNames<GExtension>, PlainNames<GExtension>>;
```
